author: Special Correspondent
text:
M. Wasim Khan, 15, who was in class 10 in a government school at Manamelkudi, was killed on the spot after a private ambulance van collided with his two-wheeler on the Kottaipattinam – Manamelkudi East Coast Road at Vannichipattinam on Tuesday.

He was riding the vehicle belonging to his father on the ECR. His school mate Sheikh Abdullah (15) was riding pillion on the vehicle.

The injured Sheikh Abdullah was referred to Thanjavur Medical College Hospital for treatment. The van driver Thavasumani has been arrested. The Kottaipattinam police have registered a case.
title: Schoolboy dies in road accident
